wikipedia_page.main: Colin McMenamin (born 12 February 1981) is a Scottish former professional football player, and is the current assistant manager of Annan Athletic.McMenamin, who played as a striker, began his career with Queen of the South before moving to Newcastle United. His first senior start came for Livingston where he spent three seasons. He also played for Shrewsbury Town, Gretna, Dundee, Queen of the South, Ross County, Greenock Morton and Stenhousemuir, as well as Falkirk and Livingston on loan.

response: *1 August 2006 – Colin McMenamin from Shrewsbury Town to Gretna, Free
